Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory730.jpg'}
{3: 'Karenina stomps the floor, confused.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "There's nothing particularly special here...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Are we supposed to get some kind of reward after we clear the maze?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't think so.", 3: '9'}
{3: 'This event is just supposed to give its participants an opportunity to express their feelings. Even if it gives out presents, it would not beâ€”'}
{2: "It wouldn't be hidden there!", 3: '11'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Whoa!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a slight tremble, a gap appears on the ground. An elevating platform seems to be stuck there.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'W-why is there a stage lift here?!', 4: '1'}
{2: '...Perhaps it was used to decorate the place?', 3: '16'}
{3: 'You recall seeing flowers or balloons somehow appearing in old movies when people triumph over hardships and reunite on a date...'}
{3: 'Perhaps that is what the stage lift is for?'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...There seem to be some burst balloons in there.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina has already pried open the floor to study the lift underneath as you speak.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's a problem with the relay. It's probably been a while since its last maintenance, but this is an easy fix...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey! Why are you staring at me like that?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having finally noticed your gaze, Karenina lifts her head from underneath the platform angrily, and her Inver-Device stands up alertly.'}
{2: 'I think you look cool.', 3: '26', 4: 'I think you look adorable.', 5: '26'}
{3: 'She quietly grumbles, and her voice lowers.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Let's do the maze again after I fix this place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I... want to see those balloons go up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Okay.', 3: '34', 4: 'I have to think about it.', 5: '35'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Hey! Don't push it!", 4: '1'}
